rect.style: fill: none; stroke: #010101; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;

polygon.style: fill: none; stroke: #010101; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;

circle.style: fill: none; stroke: #010101; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;
fill: none; stroke: #010101; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;
